TextBody:
Hi Richard,

If you applied the update, then please disregard the patch from the available patches list as it is a bug that our DevOps is trying to fix. Please just ignore it until this is fixed.
Let me know if you have follow-up questions.

Thank you,
Eduard Nut
Technical Support Engineer

TextBody:
ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000Cmhjm:ref

Eduard - thank you for the information.

I believe I have a problem related to this update. After applying the update on 7-1-2024 at 19:51EST, we now longer see detailed logs for ANY clients. See the example I provided for EVENT = CONNECTED, logs stop after the update.

The only log entraies for the past 8 days is: "Policies Received"

Should I open new ticket, or can you help? I believe the update broke something (or the engineer forget to enable something, after update was applied).

Thanks!
Subject: Netwrix Support Ticket #414326 - RopesGray - Security Advisory Confusion? Do we need to update?
Netwrix Support Ticket #414326 - RopesGray - Security Advisory Confusion? Do we need to update?

TextBody:
ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000Cmhjm:ref

CORRECTION: We do not see connection, error, failure, logs for any client (only see policies received)."
Subject: Netwrix Support Ticket #414326 - RopesGray - Security Advisory Confusion? Do we need to update?

TextBody:
This was a bug observed after the patch was released. right now there already is a hotfix available in the live update page.
I can help with this, no problem.
All logs that were not processed are stuck on the server and once the hotfix is installed, they will resume being processed.
Before we do this, I would be more comfortable if we create a snapshot before we apply that hotfix during a remote session.
Can you please see that a snapshot is created? Also let me know your timezone and availability and I will set the meeting up.

Thank you,
Eduard Nut
Technical Support Engineer
